QuestData.Title: Ophidophobia
QuestData.Description: If there's one thing I can't stand, it's snakes. Any kind of snake - doesn't matter.$b$bWhile I was out searching for salvage, I saw a nest of sea serpents surrounding the nearby wreckage.$b$bI simply can't relax knowing that those awful creatures could slither up in here at any moment.$b$bPlease, $c! Do something about them!
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill 4 Brinescale Serpents at Gorrok's Lament.
QuestData.CompletionText: You take care of those snakes for me, $c?
QuestData.RewardText: Well that's a load off my mind.$b$bThank you again, $c.
